greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Product{k>=0, 1-1/(2*7^k)}.
formula: lim inf product{0<=k<=floor(log_7(n)), floor(n/7^k)*7^k/n} for n-->oo.
mathematica: digits = 103; NProduct[1-1/(2*7^k), {k, 0, Infinity}, NProductFactors -> 200, WorkingPrecision -> digits+5] // N[#, digits+5]& // RealDigits[#, 10, digits]& // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 18 2014 *)
results.author: _Hieronymus Fischer_, Aug 14 2007
